channel.title: Need some coding help

item.title: Need some coding help
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

I was making a player-moderator area like Runescape has, (If you do not know what this is, I’m not going to bother to explain Runescape’s to you.) but I ran into a slight problem. The source I am using is Deltascape.

I tried the following codes:

if (NPCID == 815) { teleEffect = 2; sendQuest("Go to meeting?", 2470); sendQuest("Yes, I'd like to ask some questions.", 2471); sendQuest("No, thanks.", 2472); sendQuest("", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); }
This one takes you to the Abyss. ):

if (NPCID == 815) { sendQuest("", 2470); sendQuest("You are being teleported to a classified", 2471); sendQuest("meeting on Anfernioscape. If you want to", 2472); sendQuest("leave, climb down the ladder in the area.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); toX = 1000; toY = 1000; }
This one just sends text with a non-closeable interface, so, eh…
And the last, but not least, current one I use.

if (NPCID == 815) { pMod(); sM("You are now in a meeting."); toX = 1000; toY = 1000; }
So, can anyone offer some help?

Read full topic
